examples.example: 每晚睡觉前妈妈都会温柔地和我说晚安。

translate.english: Every night before going to bed, mother will gently say good night to me.

examples.example: 和朋友道完晚安后，我甜蜜地进入了梦乡。

translate.english: After saying good night to my friends, I sweetly fell asleep.

examples.example: 我微笑着对远方的朋友道了一声晚安，希望他做个好梦。

translate.english: I smiled and said good night to the distant friend, hoping that he would have a good dream.
